name: A I R B A G
name_original: A I R B A G
description:
The year is a long long time from now.

AIRBAG is a telecommunication company that works all along the galaxy to ensure communication and data exchange between planets doing manteinance and repair works for every single planet connected to the network. 

Unfortunately someone is plotting to break their plans: mysterious terrorists with flower masks and other companies work togheter to make life hard for AIRBAG technicians working on the planets.

You are one of AIRBAG's tech people and your mission is to repair all the structures on each planet before passing on to the next.. will you manage to do it?

Made for Secret Santa Jam 2022!

(Not finished, WIP, lot of features missing and/or cut down to make it in time)
